Uses of Class
javafx.scene.control.SpinnerValueFactory

  • Packages that use SpinnerValueFactory 
    Package Description
    javafx.scene.control
    The JavaFX User Interface Controls (UI Controls or just Controls) are specialized Nodes in the JavaFX Scenegraph especially suited for reuse in many different application contexts.

    • Uses of SpinnerValueFactory in javafx.scene.control

      Subclasses of SpinnerValueFactory in javafx.scene.control 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SpinnerValueFactory.DoubleSpinnerValueFactory
      A SpinnerValueFactory implementation designed to iterate through double values.
      static class  SpinnerValueFactory.IntegerSpinnerValueFactory
      A SpinnerValueFactory implementation designed to iterate through integer values.
      static class  SpinnerValueFactory.ListSpinnerValueFactory<T>
      A SpinnerValueFactory implementation designed to iterate through a list of values.
      Methods in javafx.scene.control that return SpinnerValueFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SpinnerValueFactory<T> Spinner.getValueFactory()
      Gets the value of the property valueFactory.
      Methods in javafx.scene.control that return types with arguments of type SpinnerValueFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ObjectProperty<SpinnerValueFactory<T>> Spinner.valueFactoryProperty()
      The value factory is the model behind the JavaFX Spinner control - without a value factory installed a Spinner is unusable.
      Methods in javafx.scene.control with parameters of type SpinnerValueFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Spinner.setValueFactory(SpinnerValueFactory<T> value)
      Sets the value of the property valueFactory.
      Constructors in javafx.scene.control with parameters of type SpinnerValueFactory 
      Constructor and Description
      Spinner(SpinnerValueFactory<T> valueFactory)
      Creates a Spinner instance with the given value factory set.
